channel.title: Seeking design partner for Reclaimer
channel.description:
Hello gang,
We're currently looking for a game design partner to help bring Reclaimer to the finish line. Candidly, I don't have the time or energy to complete this game myself, though I'm sitting on hundreds of hours of development and thousands of dollars of commissioned/licensed art. The partner would be responsible for reimagining the game mechanics to fit 5E, PbtA, or FitD, instead of a unique system.
Here's a Twitter link of this request too, if you're interested in helping us find a partner: https://twitter.com/LandNop/status/1464967103790948361
We got the setting and thematic materials covered, no worry there. However, we do need a partner who has experience successfully delivering on a game/KS.
If anyone is interested, feel free to email me directly at: cryptomancer.actual@gmail.com
Thanks for your time!
-Chad
